select a.id as article_id, a.title, a.short_title, a.offical_stat, a.topping_stat, a.status, a.cream_stat, a.picture as cover, a.update_time, u.user_id as author, u.user_name as author_name,u.photo as author_avatar from article a left join user_info u on a.user_id = u.user_id
order by a.update_time desc
select count(*) from article a left join user_info u on a.user_id = u.user_id
select article_id as documentId, count(*) as cnt from comment c where deleted = ${@com.github.paicoding.forum.api.model.enums.YesOrNoEnum@NO.code} group by article_id order by cnt desc

select document_id as documentId, count(*) as cnt from user_foot uf where praise_stat = ${@com.github.paicoding.forum.api.model.enums.YesOrNoEnum@YES.code} and document_type = ${@com.github.paicoding.forum.api.model.enums.DocumentTypeEnum@ARTICLE.code} group by document_id order by cnt desc
